price: Ní ọjọ́ tí àwáwí àwọn alábòsí kò níí ṣe wọ́n ní àǹfààní; ègún ń bẹ fún wọn, ilé (ìyà) burúkú sì wà fún wọn.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu al-ẓālimīna maʿdhiratuhum walahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
